creator: Thomas.Delaet@student.kuleuven.ac.be
text:
It would be nice to be able to specify as ErrorLog & TransferLog argument
"/dev/stdout" on apache 1.3.x
 
I tried this but it can't get it to work.
Or is this already possible with apache  2.0.x ?

I think this a conceptual problem. Where does /dev/stdout point to, when the
process is detached from the terminal? Perhaps you want /dev/tty or something.

Thanks for using Apache.
creator: nd@perlig.de
